title: Crew Show! (BMW M4 drive, McLaren Elva madness, RPM Act, Q&A!)
description:
Matt and Zack talk about their drive in the BMW M4, the new X6 M that arrived, Matt's Ducati loaner, Ben Chen's Gemballa crash, the RPM Act, and answer a lot of YOUR questions. 

 

Get more information on the RPM Act.

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire12 and use code smokingtire12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping!

 

Apply for free today at womply.com/smokingtire and see if you qualify for a PPP loan.

 

Keeps.com/TIRE to take action and prevent hair loss and get your first month of treatment free.

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
